title: In Which a Federal Judge Makes It Clear He's Getting Fed Up With the Inept Legal Fumbling of Chuck C. Johnson | Opinion - Liberal
text:
(Before It's News)
It didn’t take the judge very long to react to Chuck Johnson’s latest awful filing in his lawsuit against Gawker, and if you guessed that he wasn’t very happy with Johnson and his crack legal team, you’d be right. It seems these nimrods ignored several parts of what the judge …
See more at Little Green Footballs – http://littlegreenfootballs.com
